name: Horror Nightmare Collection
description:
Welcome to Horror Nightmare Collection, a series of short, retro-style horror games that aim to spook you with unique experiences. Horror is simple at its core; you don't need fancy budgets or high-tech stuff. All it takes is a raw idea and the guts to make it happen.

Some games here focus on horror and tension. You'll face different stories, each pulling you into dark twists and forcing you to confront creepy creatures. This collection keeps growing, bringing more horror games with various gameplay styles and different stories. From messing with your mind in psychological horror to cringe-worthy grotesque body horror, we've got it all.

Already in the collection are three unnerving games:



Forsaken Prison:
Awaken in a forgotten prison with a cryptic note guiding your escape. Unravel grim discoveries, help a desperate fellow prisoner, and explore dark corridors with secrets waiting to be uncovered. A flashlight leads you to a numbered cell, revealing a nightmarish transformation. Each revelation raises questions about the enigmatic nature of the forsaken prison.



Paul’s Lost Remains:
Wake up to a horrifying scream in the middle of the night. Your friend Paul is missing, and the forest holds a gruesome secret. Can you collect and assemble his remains on a cross in the center of the forest? Test your nerves and challenge your sanity in this short horror game.



Evil Crow:
You are stranded in a rural area with a broken car and no help in sight. In this first-person horror game, you have to explore a barn and a tunnel system, and collect tools. You will also witness a dark ritual involving a pentagram that unleashes a terrifying enemy that will hunt you down.

Stay tuned—more nightmares are on the way as our collection continues to grow!
